All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout, IUIElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
SeqMultiChoiceSelector
public abstract class UIMultiChoice extends UIGroup
An abstract class allowing selection of multiple choices. Choices can include image and text.
See Also:
  • UIMultiChoice.Choice

    UIMultiChoice.Choice
    Wrapper class hosting choice metadata including text and image information.
